search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for thanks.io (thanksio.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page URL for Thanks.io is: [https://info.thanks.io/pricing](https://info.thanks.io/pricing)【3:1†source】.

extracted_content.content:
### Domestic Pricing

All prices includes printing and first class postage.

_Prices with \* are for "standard" mail which is a bit slower than first class._

|  | $0/Mo, No # Limits Pay As You Go | $49/Mo, No # Limits Business | $499/Mo, No # Limits Enterprise |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| 4x6 Postcard | $1.13 | $.73 / $.69\* | $.53 / $.49\* |
| 6x9 Postcard | $1.56 | $.91 / $.87\* | $.61 / $.57\* |
| 6x11 Postcard | $1.78 | $1.13 / $1.09\* | $.81 / $.77\* |
| Windowed Letter | $2.17 | $1.17 / $.97\* | $.85 / $.65\* |
| Windowless Letter | $2.47 | $1.47 / $1.27\*  | $1.05/ $.95\* |
| Additional Letter Pages | $.20 | $.20  | $.20  |
| Notecard | $2.95 | $1.95 / $1.75\* | $1.55 | $1.35\* |
| Giftcard | $2.95 + Gift Amount | $1.95 + Gift Amount  | $1.55 + Gift Amount |
| Better Pricing? |  | Up To 50% Off  | Wholesale |
| Automation Campaigns |  |  |  |
| QR Code Tracking |  |  |  |
| Dynamic Personalization |  |  |  |
| Remove Thanks.io Branding |  |  |  |
| Website Retargeting |  |  |  |
| API Access |  |  |  |
| User Sub-Accounts |  |  |  |
| Done For You, Concierge Implementation Services |  |  |  |
|  |

International Pricing
---------------------

Includes Printing & 1st Class Postage

Scroll up for domestic pricing.

|  | Pay As You Go | Business | Enterprise |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| 4x6 Postcard | $2.28 | $1.88 | $1.73 |
| 6x11 Postcard | $2.98 | $2.33 | $1.99 |
| Windowed Letter | $3.10 | $2.29 | $2.03 |
| Windowless Letter | $3.64 | $2.64 | $2.23 |
| Notecards | $4.26 | $3.26 | $2.73 |

Data Services
-------------

|  | FREE | (Most Popular) Business | Enterprise |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| Email to Address Append | $.07 | $.07 | $.07 |
| Ip to Address Lookup | $.20 | $.20 | $.20 |
| Address To Email/Phone Append | $.20 | $.20 | $.20 |
| Radius Address Search | $.05/address | $.05/address | $.05/address |

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Pricing includes printing and postage costs. Additional features are available at higher tiers.

pricing_tiers.tier_description: No monthly fee, pay per usage.

additional_fees.fee_description: Cost per additional page for letters.
